statements: SELECT id, signature, pattern FROM malware_signatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT pattern, signature, id FROM malware_signatures WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT id, pattern FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, pattern FROM malware_signatures ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, pattern FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature LIKE '%virus%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT signature FROM malware_signatures WHERE pattern IS NOT NULL AND id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT DISTINCT pattern FROM malware_signatures WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT id, signature FROM malware_signatures WHERE pattern LIKE 'malw%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures;
SELECT signature, pattern FROM malware_signatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT file_name FROM incoming_files ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM incoming_files WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, file_name, file_data FROM incoming_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%.exe%';
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT signature FROM malware_signatures WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY signature ASC;
SELECT id, signature, pattern FROM malware_signatures WHERE pattern LIKE '%malware%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM incoming_files WHERE file_name LIKE '%virus%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, file_name FROM incoming_files WHERE LENGTH(file_data) > 1024;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures;
SELECT signature_id, signature_name FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature_name LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT signature_name, signature_pattern FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature_id = 5;
SELECT file_name, file_type_id FROM file_matches WHERE file_type_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures;
SELECT signature_id, signature_name FROM malware_signatures ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_type_id FROM file_matches WHERE file_type_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature_name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT file_name, file_type_id, signature_name FROM file_matches JOIN malware_signatures ON file_matches.matched_signature_id = malware_signatures.signature_id;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures WHERE signature_id = 10;
SELECT pattern_name FROM malware_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 5;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM malware_files WHERE malware_type = 'ransomware';
SELECT * FROM matched_files WHERE file_id = 100 AND signature_id = 20;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM malware_files;
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, count(*) as total FROM malware_patterns GROUP BY name HAVING total > 100 ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT mf.filename, ms.name FROM malware_files mf JOIN matched_files mf ON mf.id = mf.malware_file_id JOIN malware_signatures ms ON mf.signature_id = ms.id WHERE mf.status = 'infected' ORDER BY mf.filename ASC
SELECT * FROM malware_signatures ms INNER JOIN malware_files mf ON ms.id = mf.signature_id WHERE ms.status = 'active' ORDER BY ms.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT mf.filename, mp.name FROM malware_files mf JOIN malware_patterns mp ON mf.pattern_id = mp.id WHERE mf.status = 'quarantined' ORDER BY mf.filename ASC
SELECT * FROM MalwareSignatures;
SELECT signature_name, signature_pattern FROM MalwareSignatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT file_name, matched_date FROM MatchedFiles WHERE signature_id = 2 ORDER BY matched_date DESC;
SELECT type_name, threat_level FROM MalwareTypes WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT file_id, file_path, upload_date FROM FileProperties WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' AND upload_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT signature_name, signature_pattern FROM MalwareSignatures;
SELECT file_name, matched_date FROM MatchedFiles ORDER BY matched_date DESC;
SELECT type_name, threat_level FROM MalwareTypes WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT file_size, file_path FROM FileProperties WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size ASC;

SELECT file_name, signature_name, matched_score FROM MatchedFiles JOIN MalwareSignatures ON MatchedFiles.signature_id = MalwareSignatures.id JOIN FileMatches ON MatchedFiles.file_id = FileMatches.file_id ORDER BY matched_score DESC;
